attributes.action: Allow Beverley Minster's bells to continue to go off every 15 minutes and every hour 24 hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call upon the people of Beverley to show their support, allow The Beverley Minster's bells to continue to go off every 15 minutes and every hour 24 hours a day and long may they do so. It's our history and our heritage!
